title: 387. Hello, My Name Is Marijuana Pepsi!
description: Research shows that having a distinctively black name doesn’t affect your economic future. But what is the day-to-day reality of living with such a name? Marijuana Pepsi Vandyck, a newly-minted Ph.D., is well-qualified to answer this question. Her verdict: the data don’t tell the whole story.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
